attributes.action: Introduce Vegan cooking programs and introduce vegan advertising on TV etc
attributes.additional_details: It has been proven that a Vegan lifestyle has many benefits to the environment, animals lifestyle and human health benefits. Adopting a Vegan lifestyle or even a partial Vegan lifestyle can prove beneficial to everyone, the animals and the planet, whilst saving money for the Government and the NHS.
attributes.background: Introduce Vegan cooking programs, TV Vegan advertising and Vegan advertising on billboards, posters, buses etc showing the benefits to the planet, animals and our health benefits with the possibility of introducing a vegan only day to our lifestyle and a meatless Monday like other countries have.

rejection.details:
The UK Government are not responsible for TV programming or advertising. 

You could start a new petition asking for the UK Government to promote a vegan lifestyle, for example by launching a national campaign.
